StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetActualAc.vityData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode as integer, @SchoolYear as integer AS
SELECT HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE AS PLAN_TYPE, IsNULL(Substring(DATENAME(MM, ACTUAL_MONTH),0,4) + ' ' + CAST(YEAR(ACTUAL_MONTH) AS VARCHAR(4)),'') AS ACTUAL_MONTH, '' AS PLANNED_MONTH, SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN, HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN_TYPE WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN.PLAN_TYPE=HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN_TYPE.PLAN_TYPE AND SCHOOL_CODE = @SchoolCode AND SCHOOL_YEAR = @SchoolYear
